abstract: Allies aim to bar Swedish iron ore from Germany via Narvik, Norway, and other routes including Baltic Sea and Denmark and effect on Scandinavian neutrality discussed
snippet: Recent British attempts to intercept German iron ore supplies from Swedish mines indicate that the Russian-Finnish peace may be but a truce and that eventually the theatre of war operations may be extended to Scandinavia and the whole Baltic area....

headline.main: BLOCKADE IN NORTH MAY EXTEND WAR; Geographical Facts Counter Allies' Aim to Bar Swedish Iron From Germany NORWAY A FIRM NEUTRAL Forcing of Fight Into Baltic Seems Only Way Fully to Stop Ore Shipments

lead_paragraph: Recent British attempts to intercept German iron ore supplies from Swedish mines indicate that the Russian-Finnish peace may be but a truce and that eventually the theatre of war operations may be extended to Scandinavia and the whole Baltic area.
